body: 10<sup>7</sup> cells seeded into five 120 mm cell culture dishes and incubated overnight at 37°C, 5% CO<sub>2</sub> in full medium \(EMEM/10% FCS)
cells washed twice with PBS and medium exchanged for EMEM w/o FCS
grown overnight
inhibitors added to dishes and further incubated for 3 hrs at 37°C, 5% CO<sub>2</sub>: dishes 1 and 2: 0.2% DMSO; dish 3: SecinH3 12.5 µM; dish 4: SecinH3 6.25 µM; dish 5: D5 25 µM
stimulation with 100 nM insulin 10’ at 37°C
cells washed twice with ice cold PBS
cells harvested with rubber policeman in 1.5 mL lysis buffer
incubated 20’ on ice
sonicated 7’’, 40%, cycle 50
centrifuged 10’ at max. speed, 4 °C
1200 µL supernatant incubated with GST-GGA3 beads \(50 µg GST-GGA3\(1-316) per tube)
incubated 2 hrs at 4 °C under mild agitation
centrifuged for 1’ at 500 x g and supernatant discarded
pellets washed 3x with lysis buffer
50 µL Laemmli loading buffer added to pellet and incubated 5’ @ 95 °C
proteins separated by 15% SDS-PAGE; loading normalized to protein content in cell lysates
blotted on nitrocellulose with semi-dry blotting method
nitrocellulose blocked for 20’ with 5% milk powder in TBS/0.1% Tween-20
nitrocellulose washed twice with TBST
Anti-ARF6-antibody \(1:100 dilution in 5% BSA/TBST) added and incubated overnight at 4 °C
nitrocellulose washed three times with TBST
goat-anti-mouse-HRP conjugate \(1:20,000 dilution in 5% milk powder/TBST) added and incubated for one hr at RT
nitrocellulose washed with TBST
nitrocellulose covered with ECL-solution, incubated 3 min at RT; luminescence visualized with VersaDoc 5000 \(BioRad)
